title: Agent Hub WebSocket endpoint -- real-time terminal I/O and event broadcasting

comment:
PRE-REVIEW: CR-067 v0.1 -- COMPLIANT. All criteria verified with evidence as follows:

FRONTMATTER:
- title: "Agent Hub WebSocket endpoint -- real-time terminal I/O and event broadcasting" -- present, non-empty.
- revision_summary: "Initial draft" -- acceptable for v0.1 per SOP-001 Section 5.1 (CR ID not required for initial creation).

STRUCTURE (SOP-002 Section 6):
All 12 required sections present: (1) Purpose, (2) Scope with 2.1 Context/2.2 Changes Summary/2.3 Files Affected, (3) Current State, (4) Proposed State, (5) Change Description with 5.1-5.4, (6) Justification, (7) Impact Assessment with 7.1-7.3, (8) Testing Summary, (9) Implementation Plan with 9.1-9.6, (10) Execution with EI table and Execution Comments, (11) Execution Summary, (12) References.

Sections 7.4/7.5 (Development Controls, Qualified State Continuity) correctly omitted -- Section 7.2 states "Agent Hub is in genesis sandbox, not SDLC-governed."

PLACEHOLDER CONTENT: No TBD, TODO, FIXME, or XXX found. No unresolved {{...}} drafting placeholders. Execution-phase [...] placeholders are correctly present in Sections 10-11 per template specification.

TRACEABILITY: CR-066 referenced as prerequisite -- verified CLOSED at v2.0. SOP-001, SOP-002, SOP-004 correctly referenced.

EI TABLE ALIGNMENT: Section 10 EI table (EI-1 through EI-6) matches Section 9 Implementation Plan (9.1 through 9.6) with consistent task descriptions.

FORMATTING: Consistent heading hierarchy, table formatting, horizontal rules, and section numbering throughout. No typos or errors found.

CONTENT: Purpose clearly identifies blocking dependency for GUI (Rung 5). Message protocol well-specified with client/server message types. Testing Summary covers functional, error, and cleanup scenarios. Recommend for pre-approval.

POST-REVIEW: CR-067 v1.1 -- COMPLIANT. All post-review criteria verified with evidence as follows:

FRONTMATTER:
- title: "Agent Hub WebSocket endpoint -- real-time terminal I/O and event broadcasting" -- unchanged from pre-approved version.
- revision_summary: "Initial draft" -- acceptable for self-authorizing executable document per SOP-001 Section 5.1.

PRE-APPROVED CONTENT INTEGRITY:
Sections 1-9 verified identical to pre-approved v1.0 content. No modifications to locked sections.

EXECUTION ITEM TABLE (SOP-004 Section 4.2):
All 6 EIs verified:
- EI-1: Pass. Execution Summary describes broadcaster.py creation with ConnectionState, Broadcaster, fan-out methods. Evidence: commit 2deaa6a.
- EI-2: Pass. Execution Summary describes websocket.py with /ws route, subscribe/unsubscribe/input/resize handlers. Evidence: commit 2deaa6a.
- EI-3: Pass. Execution Summary describes server.py modifications wiring Broadcaster. Evidence: commit 2deaa6a.
- EI-4: Pass. Execution Summary describes hub.py modifications with set_broadcaster(), PTY callback, event emission. Evidence: commit 2deaa6a.
- EI-5: Pass. Execution Summary describes 10 UAT test cases via FastAPI TestClient, all passing (pytest 3.00s). Evidence: test results.
- EI-6: Pass. Execution Summary describes README.md updates with architecture tree, WebSocket API section, message protocol. Evidence: documentation updates.

All EIs have: (1) narrative Execution Summary with evidence, (2) Task Outcome = Pass, (3) Performed By - Date signature.

POST-REVIEW REQUIREMENTS (SOP-004 Section 10):
- Execution Complete: All 6 EIs = Pass. Confirmed.
- Blocking VARs: N/A (no Fail outcomes).
- Documentation Approved: N/A (Agent Hub is genesis sandbox, not SDLC-governed per Section 7.2).
- Evidence Documented: Commit hashes (2deaa6a) and test results recorded in Execution Summary column. Confirmed.

EXECUTION SUMMARY (Section 11):
[EXECUTION_SUMMARY] placeholder replaced with substantive content: "All 6 EIs pass. Implementation adds a WebSocket endpoint at /ws with a Broadcaster fan-out pattern... No deviations from plan."

PLACEHOLDER CONTENT: No TBD/TODO/FIXME/XXX. All EI table placeholders correctly replaced. Execution Comments section contains unused template row (optional per template guidance "Add rows as needed").

FORMATTING/TYPOS: Consistent throughout. None found.

Recommend for post-approval.
